Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using cell lysates prepared from HEK293 cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Analysis showed increased protein expression and altered solubility.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed to ensure consistency in the results.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate to minimize variability.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 protein was used as a positive control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels above 80% are considered normal.
Threshold for normal readout.Source: Custom assumption based on standard Western blot criteria

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels below 20% are considered abnormal.
Threshold for abnormal readout.Source: Custom assumption based on standard Western blot criteria
